rows.text: You matter! Take a moment to check in with yourself.

text.eng: You matter! Take a moment to check in with yourself.

reply_happy.eng: Great to hear that you are doing well. You are a wonderful parent!

reply_ok.eng: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. Nobody has all the answers but you really do your best!

reply_sad.eng: Sorry to hear that you are not having a good day. Well done for getting up every morning and trying again, even when you are tired. That is real courage and dedication!

intro_text.eng: It's great to see you again!

rows.reply_happy: Great to hear that you are doing well. You are a wonderful parent!
rows.reply_ok: Sorry that you are not having the best day. Well done for trying to figure everything out. Nobody has all the answers but you really do your best!
rows.reply_sad: Sorry to hear that you are not having a good day. Well done for getting up every morning and trying again, even when you are tired. That is real courage and dedication!
rows.intro_text: It's great to see you again!
